current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize States to use assistance provided under the
		  Hardest Hit Fund program of the Department of the Treasury to demolish blighted
		  structures, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban
			 Affairs

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (referred to in this section as the

, any amounts of assistance that
			 have been, or are, allocated for or provided to a State or State agency through
			 the Hardest Hit Fund program may be used, without limitation, to demolish
			 blighted structures.

, any
			 regulation, guidance, order, or other directive of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
title I of
			 the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008

header.#text:
Use of Hardest Hit
			 Fund amounts for demolition activities
